item.title: Archaeologists Find a Pharaoh’s Tomb, the First Since King Tut, Egypt Says
item.description: The Ministry of Antiquities said the discovery of the tomb of Thutmose II, whose wife, Hatshepsut, took the throne after his death, was the first exca...

item.title: Senate G.O.P. Passes Budget Resolution, and Punts on Tough Questions
item.description: Approval of the Republican budget plan left major questions about tax cuts and spending reduction for another day.

item.title: Hamas Didn’t Return the Body of Shiri Bibas. What Now?
item.description: The Palestinian armed group said it had handed over the body of Shiri Bibas along with her two young children and another man. Israel said forensic te...

item.title: Yankees Part With Tradition: Beards Are Now Allowed
item.description: The team is ending its longstanding policy on facial hair and will allow “well-groomed beards moving forward,” Hal Steinbrenner said.

item.title: Coinbase Says S.E.C. Will Drop Crypto Lawsuit
item.description: The end of a court fight with the largest U.S. crypto company would be a big win for an industry that financially backed President Trump.
